badge_template_activities.title: The person that earned this badge completed a 3-hour in-person workshop at Denison Edge.

554917e4-dd81-482f-8db2-3d3b28980b8c.description: The participant of this workshop identified strategies to create a lasting personal brand presence throughout their career journey. The earner of this badge create a roadmap to take their personal brand from relative obscurity to high visibility, establish a lasting personal branding presence that is consistent, clear, and cohesive throughout their career, and stay true to themself as they launch, pivot, and/or accelerate in their career.
554917e4-dd81-482f-8db2-3d3b28980b8c.name: Personal Branding: Staying True to Your Personal Brand

badge_template_activities.title: The person that earned this badge completed a 3-hour in-person workshop at Denison Edge.

d2e82603-7402-4087-af3d-1f23e988be76.description: Your personal brand is an extension of your personality. The participant of this workshop was guided through the self-reflection process to answer the question “Who Am I?” to create their personal brand statement. The earner of this badge now understands how to amplify their story, has a tone of voice for their personal brand, as they identified their values, strengths, and personality traits that were most important to them.
d2e82603-7402-4087-af3d-1f23e988be76.name: Personal Branding: Tell Your Story

badge_template_activities.title: The person that earned this badge completed a 3-hour in-person workshop at Denison Edge.

020943bc-6d6c-4308-a7f6-8a141db12ca9.description: The participant of this workshop learned about valuable practices to evaluate various credit options, terms, and amortization tables to avoid creating a dastardly interest expense fiasco. The earner of this badge can now explain advantages and disadvantages of using credit, distinguish among credit cards, other types of open-end credit, and installment loans, calculate the interest and annual percentage rate on consumer loans, read a credit card statement, and avoid predatory lending.
020943bc-6d6c-4308-a7f6-8a141db12ca9.name: Personal Finance Workshop: Credit Management

badge_template_activities.title: The person that earned this badge completed a 2-hour virtual workshop with Denison Edge.

94be3d78-5519-4693-a885-20cd9553c174.description: This badge holder participated in a 10-week, in-person deep dive into Sales. In this program, participants were involved in interactive exercises, and role-playing and heard from industry and sales-focused guest speakers.
94be3d78-5519-4693-a885-20cd9553c174.name: The Art of Sales for Every Industry

badge_template_activities.title: This Denison Edge Credential program required the recipient to achieve a minimum score of 70% in 3 Key Performance Areas: Attendance, Participation, and Activities/Assignments.
